name: Centre de distribution electrique
tag_list: chauffage-lectrique, lampe, ampoule-del, luminaires, electric-heaters, lighting-fixtures, led-bulbs, chandeliers
overview:
Since 1957, we have been offering our customers a vast array of products such as electric heating systems, projectors, lamps, light fixtures, fans, electric vehicle chargers, fuses, cabling and other related items.

One visit to any of our three locations is all you need to find what you are looking for under one roof. Always abreast of the latest trends, we ensure a constant renewal of our showroom product lines. Visit our Laval and Saint-Jerôme branches and discover them today.

For ideal warmth! CDE offers a vast array of electric heating devices that provide safe, economical and clean solutions. Whatever your needs are, you’ll find the biggest brand names here, including Convectair.

We have a large number of varied products known for their effectiveness, in stock: baseboards, forced flow electric heaters, electric heaters, heated floors, heating cables, and much much more. For reliable and quality electrical heating contact our team of specialists without further delay!
